bibl.title: Survey and Excavation. Mons Claudianus 1987-1993. Volume III: Ceramic Vessels and Related Objects, by Roberta TOMBER, Kathryn KNOWLES, Donald BAILEY and Ross THOMAS, with a contribution by Hélène CUVIGNY.

series.title: Fouilles de l'Institut français d'Archéologie orientale.

bibl.note: Pp. xvii-xxii: V.A.M. and D.P.S.P., Introduction. - 1. Roberta TOMBER, The Pottery. - 2. Ross THOMAS with Roberta TOMBER, Vessel Stoppers [pp. 252-258, figg.: Catalogue of stamps and inscriptions on stoppers]. - 3. Donald BAILEY, Terracotta and Plaster Figurines, Sealings and a Stone Group. - 4. Roberta TOMBER, Ceramic Objects. - 5. Kathryn KNOWLES, The Pottery Lamps. - Pp. 176-181, 9 figg.: Hélène CUVIGNY, Quelques dipinti amphoriques. Règne de Trajan ou IIe siècle p.C.
bibl.seg: MAXFIELD Valerie A. and David P.S. PEACOCK (Edd.), Survey and Excavation. Mons Claudianus 1987-1993. Volume III: Ceramic Vessels and Related Objects, by Roberta TOMBER, Kathryn KNOWLES, Donald BAILEY and Ross THOMAS, with a contribution by Hélène CUVIGNY. (Fouilles de l'Institut français d'Archéologie orientale. 54.)
Le Caire, Institut français d'Archéologie orientale, 2006, 4°, xxii-450 pp., 1 front., tabl., profils, figg., plans. ISBN 2-7247-0428-2. €35.

Pp. xvii-xxii: V.A.M. and D.P.S.P., Introduction. - 1. Roberta TOMBER, The Pottery. - 2. Ross THOMAS with Roberta TOMBER, Vessel Stoppers [pp. 252-258, figg.: Catalogue of stamps and inscriptions on stoppers]. - 3. Donald BAILEY, Terracotta and Plaster Figurines, Sealings and a Stone Group. - 4. Roberta TOMBER, Ceramic Objects. - 5. Kathryn KNOWLES, The Pottery Lamps. - Pp. 176-181, 9 figg.: Hélène CUVIGNY, Quelques dipinti amphoriques. Règne de Trajan ou IIe siècle p.C.

C.R. par Carol Meyer, BASP 44 (2007) pp. 269-272. - Klaus Parlasca, BibO 64 (2007) coll. 392-393. - Kristina Winther Jacobsen, CR N.S., 58 (2008) pp. 285-287. - Dominik Maschek, Tyche 24 (2009) pp. 249-251.
Maxfield Peacock Tomber Knowles Bailey Thomas Cuvigny
